mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zlcm_advert a JOIN (select aid from zlcm_advert limit #{page},#{size}) b ON a.aid = b.aid

SELECT ad.aid,ad.advert_img,ad.text_info,ad.start_time,ad.hits,ad.iphone ,a.nickname,a.avatar,a.credit,real_name,a.stor_id,ad.address FROM zlcm_advert ad INNER JOIN (SELECT ud.uid,ud.nickname,ud.credit,ud.avatar,ud.real_name,ud.stor_id FROM zlcm_user_details ud) as a ON ad.uid = a.uid WHERE ad.state = 1 ORDER BY ad.hits DESC limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ad.aid,ad.advert_img,ad.text_info,ad.start_time,ad.hits,ad.iphone ,a.nickname,a.avatar,a.credit,real_name,a.stor_id,ad.address FROM zlcm_advert ad INNER JOIN (SELECT ud.uid,ud.nickname,ud.credit,ud.avatar,ud.real_name,ud.stor_id FROM zlcm_user_details ud) as a ON ad.uid = a.uid WHERE ad.state = 1 AND recommend = 1 ORDER BY ad.start_time DESC limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT advert_img FROM zlcm_advert ad WHERE ad.aid IN (SELECT aid FROM zlcm_advert_device WHERE zlcm_advert_device.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT ad.aid,ad.advert_img,ad.text_info,ad.start_time,ad.hits,ad.iphone ,a.nickname,a.avatar,a.credit,real_name,a.stor_id,ad.address FROM zlcm_advert ad INNER JOIN (SELECT ud.uid,ud.nickname,ud.credit,ud.avatar,ud.real_name,ud.stor_id FROM zlcm_user_details ud) as a ON ad.uid = a.uid WHERE ad.aid IN (SELECT aid FROM zlcm_advert_device WHERE zlcm_advert_device.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ORDER BY ad.hits DESC limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM zlcm_advert a JOIN (select aid from zlcm_advert WHERE state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}) b ON a.aid = b.aid

SELECT a.aid,a.uid,a.advert_img,a.text_info,a.start_time,a.duration,a.state,a.iphone,a.address, s.name FROM zlcm_advert AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zlcm_store) AS s ON s.sid = a.sid WHERE a.aid IN (select o.aid from zlcm_order o WHERE o.state = 1 AND a.state = 0) ORDER BY a.start_time DESC limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
